mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Law of exponents: x power a multiplied by x power b equals x power (a + b).

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: Photosynthesis converts carbon dioxide and water into glucose and oxygen.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Area of a circle is pi multiplied by radius squared.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: The Nile is generally considered the longest river in the world.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Pythagorean theorem states that a squared plus b squared equals c squared.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: Light travels at approximately 299,792,458 meters per second.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Quadratic formula gives the roots of a quadratic equation.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: Mount Everest is the highest mountain above sea level.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: Einstein explained that energy equals mass multiplied by the square of the speed of light.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Logarithm of a product equals the sum of logarithms.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: The United Nations was founded in 1945.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: Newton's second law states that force equals mass multiplied by acceleration.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Euler's identity connects exponential, imaginary, and trigonometric functions.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: The Amazon Rainforest is often called the lungs of the Earth.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: Water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Slope of a line is change in y divided by change in x.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: The Renaissance began in Italy during the 14th century.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: The human body has 206 bones in adulthood.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Square of sine plus square of cosine of an angle equals one.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: The Magna Carta was signed in 1215.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: Ideal gas law relates pressure, volume, temperature, and amount of gas.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Volume of a sphere is four by three pi times radius cubed.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: Gravity on Earth is approximately 9.8 meters per second squared.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Derivative of x power n is n multiplied by x power n minus one.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: The Eiffel Tower was completed in 1889.

mantras.title: Daily Science Mantra
mantras.text: The speed of sound in air is roughly 343 meters per second.

mantras.title: Daily Maths Mantra
mantras.text: Sum of interior angles of a polygon equals (n minus 2) multiplied by 180 degrees.

mantras.title: Daily GK Mantra
mantras.text: Leonardo da Vinci painted the Mona Lisa.
